bibl.title: Workshops and Urban Settlement in Buto.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Pascale Ballet, The Graeco-Roman Pottery Workshops of Buto, Egyptian Archaeology 24 (2004) pp. 18-19, 4 figg. coul. Since 2007 the University of Poitiers team (working as part of the German Archaeological Institute's concession) has been investigating the relationship of the workshops and the city. - P. 16: Bérengère Redon and Guy Lecuyot, The Baths of Buto.
bibl.seg: Ballet Pascale and Gregory Marouard, Workshops and Urban Settlement in Buto.
Egyptian Archaeology 40 (2012) pp. 14-17, 1 plan, 4 figg. coul.

Supplement to: Pascale Ballet, The Graeco-Roman Pottery Workshops of Buto, Egyptian Archaeology 24 (2004) pp. 18-19, 4 figg. coul. Since 2007 the University of Poitiers team (working as part of the German Archaeological Institute's concession) has been investigating the relationship of the workshops and the city. - P. 16: Bérengère Redon and Guy Lecuyot, The Baths of Buto.
